attributes.action: Appealing for fairer spending in the county of Tyne & Wear. Tax payers money spent on Wearside and not only Tyneside.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the creation of the Tyne and Wear county, it is apparent over several years that Tyneside has had a considerable amount of money available for regeneration. As this is tax payers money from Sunderland and Newcastle why is Newcastle benefiting while Sunderland is getting left behind? This a petition for funds to be spread equaly for both cities.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

If the money you are referring to is being spent by the county council, that is a matter for the county council, as they decide how to spend money independently of Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
